text: The Dalmatae or Delmatae were an Illyrian tribe.J B Bury, The Cambridge Ancient History, Vol. 11 (Cambridge : University Press, 2000), p. 597 They lived in what is today Croatia and Bosnia and Herzegovina. Their capital was Delminium. The Dalmatae were conquered by the Roman Republic in 33 BC. == References == * * Category:Ancient people
title: Dalmatae
